summary: BALL posts Q2 earnings and sales beats, fueled by higher volumes across all beverage packaging segments.

headline: Ball (BALL) Reports Q2 Earnings: What Key Metrics Have to Say
summary: Although the revenue and EPS for Ball (BALL) give a sense of how its business performed in the quarter ended June 2025, it might be worth considering how some key metrics compare with Wall Street estimates and the year-ago numbers.

headline: Aluminum can maker Ball Corp lifts annual profit forecast buoyed by strong global demand
summary: Ball witnessed a 4.1% rise in global aluminum packaging shipments during the quarter, up from a 2.6% rise in the prior three months.  The company, serving clients like PepsiCo, Coca-Cola and Constellation Brands, increased beverage packaging sales in North and Central America to $1.61 billion, from $1.47 billion last year.  The manufacturer of aluminum cups, bottles and aerosol cans now expects comparable 2025 earnings to grow between 12% and 15%, up from a prior range of 11% to 14% growth.

headline: Ball (BALL) Q2 Earnings and Revenues Top Estimates
summary: Ball (BALL) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +3.45% and +5.86%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Ball (NYSE:BALL) Beats Expectations in Strong Q2
summary: Packaging manufacturer Ball (NYSE:BLL) reported Q2 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 12.8% year on year to $3.34 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.90 per share was 3.8% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Ball: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: BALL on Tuesday reported second-quarter profit of $212 million. On a per-share basis, the Westminster, Colorado-based company said it had profit of 76 cents. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, came to 90 cents per share.

headline: Ball Reports Second Quarter 2025 Results
summary: Ball Corporation (NYSE: BALL) today reported second quarter 2025 results. References to net sales and comparable operating earnings in today's release do not include the company's former aerospace business. Year-over-year net earnings attributable to the corporation and comparable net earnings do include the performance of the company's former aerospace business through the sale date of February 16, 2024.
